entry.title: webbed site - now with less content
entry.content:
this website has been online in a state of nothing's here yet, but it's online and kind of styled for a while now and i'm aiming to change that. first step: getting rid of the placeholder test posts that were just there to show off everything works on a technical level. second step: actually add something of interest: oh_no.jpg.

so this is a short update post to say that there's less here now - yippee!

but there's also more: i added a section for silly after-work selfies that might tickle you, even if it's not very interesting. more to follow, maybe. hopefully.
